content.detailedDescription:
This is something that happened back in 2000 when i was 8. it stuck with me my entire life, and i'm wondering if anyone has heard of something like this before.

i was in our backyard in california playing with my friends and cousins. there were about 6 of us. suddenly, everything just seemed to stop, like when you pause the television. everyone including myself was paralyzed. i remember i was facing our house when this happened. out of nowhere i saw what looked like egyptian hieroglyphics pan across my field of vision. it seemed very dream like and happened quickly. then, involuntarily, my head turned towards the sky and i heard a very strange voice. it was clearly someone speaking, but i've never heard anything like it before. at the time i could only describe it as an alien's voice. after the voice finished speaking, everyone started moving again from their paralyzed positions. none of my friends realized that anything had happened. i immediately ran inside to tell my mom but she just laughed it off and said it was nothing.
content.summary: Playing outside with friends when i was a kid, time seemed to stop, heard alien voice

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i were headed home on cajalco��� rd. from corona around 6pm when we noticed several lights from aircraft ahead to the east, we both noticed one aircraft was still as we got closer & closer we were speculating what it was. i rolled down my window as we got near, 80ft up & 75 yards right of the road the road, there was no sound and i could clearly see that it wasn't a helicopter. it was a triangle aircraft with white lights on the tips also a red light in the center. i know my aircraft very well & live near march afb, i have no idea what the heck it was. a few cars pulled over to see but my dad kept going. i looked back and watched it ascend up then dart south. craziest thing i've ever witnessed.
content.summary: Triangle ufo sighted by lake mathews, ca

content.detailedDescription: We were driving thru catskill region returning to new jersey. travelling east on rt. 30 at approx 8pm and upon passing downsville dam, i noticed what appeared to be a light on the north bank of the reservoir. i can't say if the light was on the bank or hovering over it. the light at first appeared small but as it headed accross the water, as any object approaching from a distance, it grew in size. my first thought was that it was a power boat with a search light but i knew that no power boats were allowed on the reservoir. it crossed the water at an altitude not higher than 100ft. as it approached the south bank, because the water level was very low at the time, it continued its course up the steep bank to the point at which it intercepted my vehicle on rt.30. because of its slow speed my passenger and i were briefly able to clearly view its underside and neither of us noticed any markings, lights, windows, rivets, etc. absolutely no sound was emitted. it appeared to be equal in size to the width of the roadbed which is a two lane road. object than accelerated upward and southeasterly and disappeared to the size of a pinpoint in an instant. we were the only vehicle on the road at the time and we concluded that whatever it was, it made a deliberate effort to intercept us. its now 41 years later and my passenger and i, when passing the sighting site, always bring up the question as to what the devil did we see that night. i decided it was time to go on record for what ever benefit someone could gain from the reporting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Object crossed pepacton reservoir, passed slowly over my vehicle driving rt.30 and than sped off

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my cat out the backdoor when i noticed a green star shaped stationary object in the sky.  i stepped out into the backyard to get a better look and the object began to move rapidly to the north in a downward trajectory until in disappeared beyond the treeline.  the color of the object did not flicker or pulsate but glowed steadily.  i did not hear any sound when it moved.

i don't know what to make of the object because it looked like a huge green star.  i did see a plane, possibly a helicopter to the east heading south after the object had disappeared but it had white and red lights.
content.summary: Green star looking object, hovered then moved in downward trajectory

content.detailedDescription: I went out to smoke the weather was nice after 2:00 am looked up to star notice one twinkling caught my attention then shot to the nw and disappeared i was stunned finish smoking in wonder not a shotting star was still for seconds while i watched it
content.summary: I thought it was a star then it shot to the nw then vanished i was out smoking by my self

content.detailedDescription: We were all instructed to go to the goddard space flight website to view the perigee of comet ison, i noted a patch darkness above the lower southwest limb.Intrigued i watched it move closer to the sun and farther away it appeared to be creating or manipulating the sunspots,a beam has been visible on four occasions including today @ 1:30.I was told by a ufo reporting center this was a optical artifact...The only problems i have w/this explanation is the movement of the object,the beam stops at the object and the fact it is being photographed in soft x-ray not optical.It appears at times when i update the image sometimes the the sdo eve instrumentation is focused only on this object, this reorientation has occured four times since november,the mission is very stuctured and any adjustment to the satellite is well documented yet these movements do not correlate with the mission timeline.After a couple months of watching this and getting my friends views(i must appear insane)we have all drawn the conclusion the object has mass hence the nonpenetration of x-rays.My initial feeling was that of powerlessness and shock that was soon replaced by awe and conjecture.The objects size is on the order of a large planet being several times larger that of our own.It is stationary, only ascending and descending, not orbiting, this would prove to be extremely power consuming.It is not visible in the visible spectrum only soft x-ray.I understand this is alot to take in and i am probably not the first to question this object but from the standpoint of how x-rays work and a knowledge of advanced physics i am imagining stellar lifting taking place on our star but that is pure conjecture.Please help me to discover the true nature of this object.The realtime phone application is swx nasa space weather the format is sdo eve megs sam  yours truly,jeff
content.summary: Looking at the sdo observatory for the comet ison turnaround noted a stationary chevron hovering over  lower southwest limb of sun

content.detailedDescription:
On my drive to work, roughly 4am chicago time) i saw strange lights almost immediately once i got out of my subdivision and onto a secondary road. whilst driving west on 143 rd st. in homer glen from west of parker rd to hwy i355 i was completely enamored by these strangely shaped beams of light. once i got to the hwy i saw them more clearly. just by luck i had my "good" cell phone with me and was able to snap a shot of the lights. 

the lights did not move, they did not make noise. i observed them from some distance. i was on the hwy and they looked to be high in the sky off in the distance south of i355 @ archer ave. exit. 

one was red-orange, one was white, one was yellow, and the others were very faint, but there seemed to be at least 4 and as many as 6 beams of light. 

i first thought that the lights may be some chemical reaction of the gasses released into the atmosphere by the refinery, but then i saw the smoke from the refinery being blown away almost immediately escaping the smoke stack, and these lights were high above making it seem impossible that plumes of anything would go straight up because of the winds that morning. 

my feelings were that of amazement. i don't like to jump to conclusions as to what this may be. i am smart enough o realize that i do not know much about chemical reactions of gasses in the atmosphere and i also know nothing about aliens, or ufo sightings. 

i lost sight of the object by the time i got to the i55 exit because i kept driving on my way to work.
content.summary: Strangely shaped lights with no source observable stationary in the early morning sky.

content.detailedDescription: This crystalline and light structured rod sphere was in view in the south-western sky for weeks like it was orbiting the planet. i thought it was unusual because of the color shifts,rod type crystalline look  and color changes. as shown in the video it looks textured, it changes colors and with the high powered binoculars you could see a lighted changing colors snow flake structure.It was extremely beautiful. i have a busy life,too busy for b.S.  posted to see what other people think it was. it was in oct. of 2013 on a predictable orbit,about 10-11 pm,very low to the horizon. i'm not sure in the video why there are no stars...Maybe they are there. what is it?
content.summary: This crystalline and light structured sphere seemingly orbiting the earth

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting ready to go to bed and looked out my window at about 2:20 am to see how the weather was .  i looked across the street at my neighbors house and noticed a blinking object i thought it was a plane at first then i decided to go upstairs to get a better view of it . i went up to my second floor bedroom and looked out the window it  was still there hovering with bright lights in a circular motion it looked like they were shining a huge beam of light below the object. i showed my girlfriend what i saw . i kept watching the object for about 45 minutes  i wanted to get my camera to video it but i wasn't able to get a good enough picture of it my camera wouldn't zoom in enough . i called my brother to tell him about what i saw .
then i looked once more it was still there  i did notice a car stop and look to see what the light was next i went to bed i was exhausted. 
i decided i would check the next day !
content.summary: Object over house hovering showing green lights

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone today: 

i was driving south on woods chapel road last night at approximately 7:00 p.M. when i noticed several bright orange lights above the cars behind me in my rear-view mirror.  at first i thought it must have been some strange light on someone's antenna, but realized that it was floating above the cars in the distance. the shape of the object was oval and there were orange lights spinning around the edge of it.  i could not see the object itself, only the lights which remained int he same position as they spun around the oval object, however the object was tumbling around in the sky. it was very strange and i've never seen anything like it. i watched it for two or three minutes while driving and at a stop light-- until the road dipped down.  when i went back up the hill the object was no longer there. the direction of the object was towards lake tapawingo. i saw a car on ligget road that had its emergency flashing lights on where the location would have been good to see the object so there may be another witness. the size of the object was large - it was the width of the cars behind me but i could not tell the distance. there was no sound. i'm hoping someone else saw this and will report it. i'm quite shaken by the experience.
content.summary: Tumbling ufo over lake tapawingo

content.detailedDescription: Driving to downtown edmonds at approximately 7:30pm.  as i descended down into the "bowl" of edmonds (i was positioned on a hill so my view was partially towards the sky), i saw above me a glowing orange light that appeared to be moving very slowly--slower than my vehicle was driving, which was approximately 25-30 mph.  upon further observation, i noticed two other lights, which together with the first, appeared to be making the shape of large triangle (a light at each point).  all points moved together in the same shape.  the light emitted looked like lanterns glowing in the sky.  i saw didn't hear any noises from within my vehicle.  cloud cover prevented any further visual observation.  estimated elevation was approximately 10k feet.  direction w/nw.
content.summary: Viewed three orange glowing lights through cloud cover in shape of large triangle.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on 28north  and i noticed this object shooting across the sky..The sky  was clear and i was able to track this object across the sky for at least 15-20 seconds until it disappeared over the hillside.I was just wondering if there ever were any other reports of this..I know it happened 2 years ago but i always wonder what it was.
content.summary: Fireball of some kind

content.detailedDescription: On christmas day in the evening coming home from gainesville, my wife and i pulled into our driveway, my pick-up facing due west. as i got out i turned toward the east and noticed in the sky above and behind my front neighbor's house, a bright blood red round light, i then said to my wife, auri look how big and red mars is, i then turned to open the house door, my wife who had just gotten out of the truck just stood looking at "mars" and said to me, come here that's not mars it's moving. we live seven miles northeast of orlando's international airport(mccoy or mco) and are on the landing approach path, takeoff pathways usually go west of our house then they bank east or north or west. our house is also six miles south of orlando's executive airport home of the blimps, so we are accustomed to all kinds of aircraft flying around at all hours, i went back to my front yard to see what my wife said was moving and now the red light which when i first saw it was about the size of a pea at arm's length, was now,maybe twenty seconds latter,the size of a golf ball at arm's length and a bright blood red and looked solid,we could hear noise from the airport there was no noise from object, to my right a plane taking off banked east and as it did the objet which was now above and to the south just went straight up and was gone,we both just stood there not believing what we just saw,we called our family to tell them
content.summary: Got home with wife saw a bright blood red light to the east,at first i thought it was mars, but it got bigger and moved fast to the west then as a plane from mco(7miles sw of me) banked to the east, the light shot straight up and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was with a group of random kayakers staying at the american canoe association cabins for the weekend at lake sebago in harriman park ny approx 9 years ago during the summer.  someone mentioned there was an astronomy event taking place this night at the other end of the lake at sebago beach.  about 10 people decided to drive there, one woman that i never met decided to kayak to the beach with me.  there were a lot of telescopes set up looking at different points in the sky and we waited for the moon to set.  when ever someone wanted to see through someone else's scope the owner would tell you what you were going to be looking at and point up to its location in the sky with a laser pointer.  after this we left in our kayaks.  this part of the lake was long and not very wide.  we traveled about 3/4 of a mile straight and we noticed a yellow light fly up to us from behind very fast and silent about the size of a basketball.  it was over our right shoulder and when it reached us it made a right turn without changing speed.  the object was within 50 feet of us nomore than 20 feet high above the water and it maintained that space when it turned right and went over the trees at the same 20 feet above the trees.  the trees were to the right of us so we seen the ufo below the tree line and when it went over the tree line it followed the contour of the trees up on the hill. this was between 1 and 2 seconds.  we lost site of it because it stayed low and once it went over the hill and trees it was gone.  when i seen this the woman asked me "what was that?"  we were shocked but not extremely nervous.  we talked about how nothing flys like that and it was not an animal or a flashlight from the people back at the beach.  i sighed the thought that maybe it was some super secret military spy technology but not likely.  i think it flew by to see what everyone was doing with their laser pointers and scopes in the sky and then it flew up behind us but did not pass us.
content.summary: Another person and i witnessed an orb fly past us very close and fast then turn 90 degrees full speed apron 9 years ago.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I woke up at about 3am on 1/22/14 trying to take some covers back from my dog and happened to notice a bright light almost aimed at me and seen it and another light going back and fourth east to west over lake amistad the one light vanished and the second light hovered for a second and when i got up to look out the window it was vanished. i knew right away from how they were moving it was not any type of terrestrial craft. i then could not return to sleep for quite some time.
content.summary: Two lights dancing back and fourth over lake

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work at approx 5:50am 1/22/14. heading south on joslyn road just passing canterbury village on the right. see super bright ball of light in the sky to the south. looks like a supernova exploding or something, thats what i thought it might be. notice that there is a smaller light to the bottom right of the larger one. looks like a star but brighter and slighly larger. i continue to watch this object as i drive and as i keep glancing at it, it is getting lower in the horizon. (this is a span of maybe 7 minutes). the last time i saw it was on giddings road to the southeast in the sky slightly above the horizon. kept wondering if the cars in front of me were seeing the same thing but no one was reacting. at first glance i thought nothing of it, but it was so bright yellow-orangish-white i kept thinking i was witnessing a supernova with a star to the bottom right. that star or whatever it was is not there in the morning and dissapeared along with the large object.
content.summary: Bright large light with smaller star-like light below to the right

content.detailedDescription: The anniversary saw light come towards yard from my lounge room my mum 3yr old niece myself went onto the balcony where the orb about the size of my car a corolla then stopped dead behind the ridge capping of my neighbours 2 story home approx. 50ft from us the orb was stationary  the inside cleared to reveal a saucer shape which i commented on and telepathically in my head with my voice tone was told "old fashioned"it produced a long telescopic arm similar to how the front of a digital camera expanding and this saucer became huge taking up all my vision in blackness except for a chink of light at the top of my vision it moved back into place and was as we had first saw it, telepathically to me stated  "its leaving now'moved along above ridge capping slightly sparkled at the edges became a red pinpoint did  a sharp uturn at huge speed straight towards one  star we stood petrified,my mum saw some events differently to myself one being when my vision was taken with dark only, mum coud see inside craft and a piece of furniture alone a   trolley.We contacted bill chalker a renowed ufologist here but as no trace elements were left it was as  it was a sighting we will never forget or get over as the experience was very frightening unexplainable
content.summary: Upside down hat

content.detailedDescription: So at about 12am tonight i was outside with my dogs and was star gazing, as i always do because the sky is so clear and beautiful where i live. i thought at first it was a star, but then noticed that it was an odd golden light color. it appeared to be quite far away. i was staring at it because it was so bright, and i was wondering if it was a satillite. however, as i was looking, it began to move in a back and forth jerky motion, very fast. it covered a lot of ground as i watched it, and also went in several directions. it did not seem like it had any particular destination, it was just randomly moving. it was definitely not a satillite, as they are slower and not so..., jerky. i am curious, i thought it was interesting. my husband and my brother are avid aviation fans, and they did not know what it was, so i hope someone could fulfill my curiosity!
content.summary: Bright golden light similar to a satillite but moved very fast and jerky

content.detailedDescription: I am an american who was learning classical indian music, and living in kolkata at the time in dec.1973. i lived at bondel rd ,about a half mile away from rash behari ave. in south kolkata. rash behari ave is a long street with many saree shops  and instrument makers on it. ihad commissioned a musical instrument to be made for me a tanpura vocal  by the famous maker hiren roy, and i used to go to his shop regularly to check on the progress of it , as it took about one year to make.I was walking down r.B. av. on my way to the shop about 5 oclock late afternoon, when i noticed everyone , thousands of people all looking up at 3 ufos hovering right above us on the street.They were approx no more than 2 to 3 hundred feet above us directly over the middle of the ave.I thought that these were three ufos. i tried to get the maker of my instrument to come out of his shop and look at these objects but he was busy working and did not come out however i looked at the objects for about 5 minutes, along with thousands of indians i also took my eyes off the objects momentarily to look at the reaction from all the people who were also witnessing them and everyone was just sort of in a daze staring ,many with mouths open and noone talking . so there were three of them quite close to each other about 150 feet apart just hovering the object in the middle of the other two ufos ejected a blue light, similar to a lightening bolt, shooting out from the object about 70 feet,and then it looked like it retracted the light back into the ship. then a second later another bolt of a deep blue light shot out but this time adifferent length. this happened several more times  all with different lengths of light or more like lightening bolts of light. no sound  i stared at them and all the people watching them then, the three just flew so fast away they were gone in a split second headed south. the next day in one of the english newspapers there was a report ap wirephoto that read yesterday the telerad space agency in ontario canada reprted seeing thousands of ufos moving at a tremendous rate of speed towards the north pole
content.summary: I along with thousands of indians  witnessed 3 ufos hovering in kolkata 1973

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling to san antonio from yoakum, tx. halfway between yoakum,tx and gonzales, tx, i was distracted by a bright white shape so i looked out my window and saw 3 white objects hovering in the sky. the far left and middle objects were extremely close, while the far right object was a greater distance away.  my first thought was it may be an airplane but after looking closer i realized that there was no way because the objects were extremely too close together. the far right object disappeared instantly. the other 2 followed one other at close range for a few minutes before coming to a complete stop. they then separated quickly. they then instantly flew toward one other. finally, they flew straight toward each other and once it looked like they collided, i saw a bright light flash straight up towards the sky.  they were gone in an instant. i waited awhile to see if i saw them again but i did not.  my mouth dropped open and i was shocked as to what i just saw. this sighting made me feel deeply confused and wanting an explanation to what i just saw. this sighting took place over acres of farmland in the country.
content.summary: 3 white objects in sky.Far right object disappeared first, other 2 followed each other at close range, then separated before flying toward one another. then vanished in air.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving and snapping shots of downtown columbus skyline.
after viewing pics uploaded to facebook; noticed shiny object in left of 3 frames taken. zoomed image shows outlined/hidden disc shaped object.
this is not a reflection of camera or windshiel because other pics do not have this image.
content.summary: Did not see object until after viewing attached pics

content.detailedDescription: Was in the back yard with the dogs, i noticed a moving light, was thinking it was a plane, but the lights did not blink, i keep looking and can best describe it as a white orb, looked like a bright star to the east. over mission espada area, was moving north and pulse brighter. started to hear a helicopter, as the orb moved past my sight, the chopper came into view with the normal red plain type lights. the orb was moving to fast for the chopper to catch up to. i lost both objects when the went behind the roof line of the neighbors house. there was no sound from the orb. should also say that i could make out the shape of the chopper but the orb was like a bright star. i see many things on the south side, much less light pollution here, i enjoy looking at stars and keep an eye to the sky.
content.summary: Star like orb moving north followed by helicopter.

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving back from the famous gold coast region of south - east queensland to my home in brisbane, the state capitol and i had just descended down a slope which continued as a very straight section of the highway. i turned to the right and noticed that the pre-dawn light was softly illuminating the sky and trees. 
i looked up and noticed a very large cumulonimbus calvus cloud which was also being slightly lit from the pre-dawn light.
as i drove straight ahead something caught my eye and i looked up to see a rotating circle of lights descending through the cloud.
at this point i would like to mention that i was a professional commercial and scientific photographer which deals with the study of the behavior of light.
the lights were somewhere between a spotlight and a floodlight and dispersed through the cloud wider at the bottom.  i am fairly sure there were eight lights. they rotated clockwise looking up at them. they took about 2 seconds to complete a full rotation.
at no time did i actually see the object itself which was hidden above the cloud. 
i estimate it would have been at about 5000 feet and the circle of lights were about 6 inches wide at arm's length.... so must have been a large object.

after i had observed it for  about one minute it suddenly did a pitch and yaw movement and then ascended back up above the cloud. the sky was clear apart from that one big cloud.
content.summary: Rotating circle of lights descended through cloud, hovered and then did a pitch & yaw movement and ascended.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On1/21/14 around 7:30-8 @ night, i stepped out on my porch to smoke.It was a very clear cold quiet night..I looked across the road towards the hills (habit) and saw what looked to be a very bright white star low in the sky..As i was looking at it i had to blink n look closer because it started pulsing into red, blue, green then white again..And then i noticed a much smaller white light approaching it and then circling around it..Like a moth circling a bulb..I went back in..Came back out around 8:50 pm or so n looked that way again but it was gone..I didn't see it anywhere so i started looking around the yard and hills because not one animal was making a sound..Not even our nightly singers the coyotes...Then i looked back across the way again n saw that thing back hanging really low over the house on the hill n pulsing those colors again..Wentback in again..Came back outside at 10 pm for the last time and saw it directly straight out ahead of me across the way right above the trees and it seemed slot closer so i was watching it really close n it was still changing colors but it also seemed to have a really large bright white light kind of set a like above the pulsing ones that was angled down like a searchlight..It hovered a minute then started moving really smoothly into a path that seemed to be coming straight towards my place but abruptly swept right then left then back again like a zigzag..It seemed to be looking for something...Scared the he'll out of me..Anyway right after the zigzag path it headed away from me so fast it took about half of a second to disappear...But while it was moving it sank so low i could only see it through the trees for a second or two then right back to the treetop line again...Nowi tell y'all,,i've spent just about all my life outside. i was raised living off the river and hunting and growing our own vegetables..We also trapped.. i've never once in my life seen anything like this n i'm soon turning 42 yes old. n i ain't wishing fondly to see it again anytime soon...It made my hair on my neck stand up scared me so bad cuz of what i saw and the fact not one animal was making a sound and i live on a cow farm! it was really wierd and i can't explain it so i'm passing it on to y'all to figure out...Good luck cuz i'm struck dumb on this one n i've been out side with the critters the majority of my life. i've seen alot of strange things but this one i just can't wrap my brain around it...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was outside smoking after dark saw what looked to be a very bright star but then it started changing color,saw it twice more, different spots,last time extremely low & hovering then moving fluidly & fast in rapidly changing path like sweeping,,disappeared

content.detailedDescription: At around 7:00 pm on a very clear night, with no moon. i went outside to take care of animals and observed a pulsing orange light hovering in the sky to the south east of my position. it was just above the constellation orion at the time and i almost dismissed it as a star. however i felt compelled to watch it, so i remained motionless and observed it as it seemed to drop for a few seconds, then return to its original position. it then began flying in a north-west direction wobbling as it did. eventually it flew directly over my house, still moving from side to side and kept going. i attempted to capture it with my camera but when i tried, there was nothing on the screen and it died on new batteries. i watched it for a few more minutes until it dispelled what looked like a glowing blue mist, then disappeared completely. i then resumed what i was doing before, until i heard what sounded like a fighter jet flying nearby. im not sure what i saw, but it wasn't a drone, or plane, im all to familiar with the marker light set-up on a plane.
content.summary: Star-like craft hovering by the orion constellation, before changing course and flying over house.

content.detailedDescription: Over the last month, i had been noticing a blinking hovering object in the sky and was trying to figure out what it was, paying more attention to the sky. walking towards the bike path through the field by patriot's square, i saw a craft flying just above treeline. it was completely silent and transparent, all i could see were the lights that seemed to be on two wings with one in the center, one in the front and one on the back. the lights were solid white and as the craft then flew over my head, the lights turned red and blinked as if acknowledging my presence, then turned white again and continued flying at a quicker pace. i continued my walk home dumbfounded.
content.summary: Craft travelled in a straight path silently overhead, lights were solid white then turned red and blinked when directly overhead.

content.detailedDescription: At first i thought it was a regular cellular tower but it was lower and didn't have a second set of flashing lights under it. it was just hovering. i drove closer and saw it wasn't attached to anything. big, the size of a one bedroom house. i turned around to get a picture but it was flying away when i did and was long gone when i got back. no trace of it in the sky or anything.
content.summary: Size of a one bedroom house. shaped like a blimp but with many square like objects attached to it.

content.detailedDescription: As i was pulling into the driveway this particular evening, i noticed a very slow and low flying aircraft just above the trees and roofs two houses down from mine.  it seemed unusual so i stayed in the truck and watched as it slowly turned and flew over the neighbors houses and also noticed the irregular light blinking pattern which seemed atypical to that of other planes and helicopters.  during this time i searched for my cell phone to take a picture and then it was over my house and i stepped out of the vehicle and realized that there was absolutely no noise or emissions coming from this craft either.  i was able to obtain some kind of video, but by the time i was able to gather myself, the video i captured did not show all of the lights and their distinct pattern.  as the craft flew over, i noticed it was the clear shape of a triangle and was a combination of black as well as a grey, with somewhat of a pattern or what seemed like lines which met in the center of craft out to the corners, and within each of those triangles had lines connecting the edge of the craft to the lines coming from corners to meet in the center.  as mentioned earlier, i did obtain some video, but it unclear of the shape and all three of the lights blinking pattern, but as soon as i got back into the vehicle, it was higher in the sky and it seemed to by flying at a faster rate that before when going over the houses.  i then got back into the vehicle to try and follow the craft.  i was able to for about two or three miles, turned onto an upcoming street, and then it just disappeared and could not find it anywhere, in any direction nearby or off in the distance.  i then went back to the house and kept watching out the window every so often to check if it would happen to be out and nearby again, but that was the last i saw of the craft.
content.summary: When pulling into driveway, noticed a very slow and low flying craft just above the trees and houses of the neighborhood.  craft was dark triangle shaped with 3 lights blinking in their own kind of sequence, unusual and irregular to planes etc.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my sister's home in florida during the late afternoon, and traveling west on ridgewood lakes blvd., near hwy 27. i saw an intersting cloud formation, north, that looked like a dragon with razor sharp teeth, and took 4 pictures.  
when i loaded the photos on my computer, i noticed the "spots" on two of my shots. 
i noticed that the angle of the "spots" and shade of them were different in both shots. when blown up, they seem to be darker on the bottom than the top. the car was traveling about 35 mph, but "spots" were blurry,trees nearby were not.  my thoughts:object was traveling slow enough for camera shutter to catch it ,but too fast to get a clear shot.
content.summary: The images are on photos i took of an interesting  cloud.

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work at 9am. i saw a brilliantly bright object over wasilla. at times it seemed to stop and hover. it was like an oval light. there were structural details. it was just a bright whiteish yellow oval light. i lost sight of it after about ten minutes. it seemed to have disappeared.
content.summary: It was a clear morning i observeved a bright object that was not a plane and did not behave like a plane. it had no details. it oval
